title: Teleport to generated 3D White Latex Forest (“the hive”) when touching Puro

requirements.text: Add a new 3D scene representing “the hive”: a generated 3D “white latex forest” environment inspired by the *Changed* (DragonSnow) white latex forest, using only original/procedurally generated geometry/materials (no copyrighted assets).

quotes: The hive is the white latex forest
The white latex forest is from changed by dragonsnow

acceptanceCriteria: A new React Three Fiber scene component exists for the white latex forest environment (the hive).
The hive scene renders without requiring external model downloads or third-party assets.
Visuals communicate a white/latex-like forest through lighting, palette, and materials while remaining clearly original (not a ripped recreation).

requirements.text: Implement player teleport-on-touch with Puro: when the player avatar collides/enters proximity with the existing Puro 3D model, transition gameplay from the library scene to the hive (white latex forest) scene and place the player at a defined spawn point in the hive.

quotes: Make it teleport you to the hive if you touch puro

acceptanceCriteria: Touching/entering the existing Puro proximity radius triggers a scene change to the hive.
Teleport trigger uses a one-shot + cooldown/hysteresis guard so it does not repeatedly fire every frame while in contact.
After teleport, the camera and player controls continue to function normally in the hive scene.

requirements.text: Replace the current “touch Puro unlocks admin mode” proximity secret in `frontend/src/game/scene/LibraryScene.tsx` with the new teleport-to-hive behavior (so touching Puro teleports instead of unlocking admin mode). Any user-facing feedback text related to teleport must be in English.

quotes: Make it teleport you to the hive if you touch puro

acceptanceCriteria: In the library scene, Puro proximity no longer calls `attemptUnlock('ADMIN')` as its primary effect.
If a toast/overlay is shown for teleport, its text is English-only.
Clicking Puro still opens dialogue as before (teleport is specifically on touch/proximity, not on click).

constraints: Do not edit files under `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`, or anything inside `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose them instead).
Keep all backend logic in the existing single Motoko actor (`backend/main.mo`) if any backend changes are later required; do not introduce additional backend services.
User-facing text introduced by this change must be in English.
nonGoals: Do not implement or integrate external 3D models/maps from *Changed* or any copyrighted asset extraction.
Do not add multiplayer, real-time networking, chat, or web sockets.
Do not add third-party authentication beyond Internet Identity.
Do not redesign unrelated UI panels/mini-games beyond what is necessary to support the new hive scene and teleport transition.
